title: Alpha to PBE
body: Few months ago i got alpha access and i love it but i am trying to get into pbe from a lot of time can Riot change my alpha access to PBE access. Thank you

replies.body:
Unfortunately, we cannot. They're two entirely different systems that are testing completely different content. If you haven't already, you can check on the status of your application or apply [here](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe).

Let me know if you have any questions.

Thanks for the reply
I hope i could get pbe access but gotta say alpha is great too love it
